features: The information below applies to each unit in the pack
HELPS MAINTAIN NORMAL MOISTURE BALANCE -- It nourishes, hydrates and soothes. Thanks to him, you will forget what dryness, cracks, inflammation and peeling are.
GENTLE ON YOUR LIPS -- The lip balm pleasant and light texture seems to envelop the skin and is quickly absorbed.
LONG LASTING -- Lip relief within seconds to last throughout the day, leaving your lips feeling naturally soft, smooth and healthy.
EASY TO USE -- The lip balm with light movements spreads evenly on the lips, leaving a light sheen.
Package contents: 1 Item of Pretty Cherubs Aloe Vera Moisturising Lip Balm 2-Pieces. Actual packaging may vary.
description: Ingredients Paraffinum Liquidum, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Ozokerite, Cera Alba, Triisodecyl Trimellitate, Hydrogenated Microcrystalline Wax, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal. Directions Use as frequently as required Safety Warning External application only. In case of irritation, stop the application. Not suitable for children. Please retain this packaging for future reference. See more
